analysis.key_quote: This proposed rule concerns me deeply. By creating a new category of employees known as Schedule P/C, it removes long-standing civil service protections and turns career roles into at-will positions.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the removal of civil service protections, due process rights, and the potential for increased politicization of federal employment, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and employee rights.
